name: MIS National Summary of Receipts and Payments
description:
Produces a summary of all receipts and payments for all establishments for a date range. It is designed to serve Finance Policy Group.
FIN0089 - v00.00.01 Last Modified 24/09/2019

dataset.name: Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACT31, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_SAVINGS, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_SAVINGS_TRANSACTION, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_PRIVATE_CASH, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE AS TRANSACTION_DATE_, AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM */)) AND ((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter End Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:102) */)))) GROUP BY AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE, CREDIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION, CREDIT_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACT31, CREDIT_SAVINGS, DEBIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION, DEBIT_SAVINGS_TRANSACTION, DEBIT_PRIVATE_CASH, TRANSACTION_DATE_, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, DEBIT_PRIVATE_CASH || DEBIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION || DEBIT_SAVINGS_TRANSACTION AS V_TOTAL_DEBITS_OF_3_ACCOUNTS, CREDIT_PRIVATE_CASH_TRANSACT31 || CREDIT_SPEND_TRANSACTION || CREDIT_SAVINGS AS V_TOTAL_CREDITS_OF_3_ACCOUNTS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_EXCLUDE_ALL_ZERO_RECEIPTS <> 0)
